code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={items:[{id:'id-1',name:'Rosie Simpson',number:'459-12-56'},{id:'id-2',name:'Hermione Kline',number:'443-89-12'},{id:'id-3',name:'Eden Clements',number:'645-17-79'},{id:'id-4',name:'Annie Copeland',number:'227-91-26'}],filter:''};export var contactsSlice=createSlice({name:'contacts',initialState:initialState,reducers:{addContact:function addContact(state,action){state.items.push(action.payload);},deleteContact:function deleteContact(state,action){state.items=state.items.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});},filterContact:function filterContact(state,action){state.filter=action.payload;}}});var _contactsSlice$action=contactsSlice.actions,addContact=_contactsSlice$action.addContact,deleteContact=_contactsSlice$action.deleteContact,filterContact=_contactsSlice$action.filterContact;export{addContact,deleteContact,filterContact};export var contactsReducer=contactsSlice.reducer;export var contactsSelector=function contactsSelector(state){return state.contacts.items;};
